entry.title: $2495 // Rare 2.5 BR / 1 Bath Astoria Apt., Sunny, Spacious, Centrally located!
entry.content:
A Spacious and Sunny 2.5 BR apt, Full floor unit in the Heart of Astoria!
Hardwood floors, separate kitchen.
2 Queenside BR's plus Home office or Dressing Area.
Great closet space.
Convenient to both the N train and R/M train stations.
Prime Astoria location with tons of restaurants, bars and shopping.
Centrally located in great residential neighborhood.
Sorry NO Pets
For Mid-August availability
Under renovation. Pictures coming soon!
Please see floorplan
Call for more info or to schedule an showing!
